Callie, Saraban:
You want to find him? Oh... I myself would like to go on a quest, but can't leave the village. Time restless now... Never know what will happen tomorrow.
The day we were attacked by monsters, he saved not only me, but all Arty. We almost defeated the Marshal, when the monster gathered strength for the final blow... If Caine was not on assistance from Benon would be in ruins.
